mdRecord.dcterms:isPartOf: Francis H. Pierpont Civil War Telegrams
mdRecord.dcterms:title: Halleck, Henry W. to Pierpont, Francis H.
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Halleck, Henry W.
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Gov Pierpoint [Francis H. Pierpont] Wheeling Sept 16 1862. By Telegraph from Washn, 16 1862. Genl Crooks & Genl Hartsuff are both fighting In the field at the present time & cannot now be reached can you name some other general for the Kanawha who is Familiar with the country HW Halleck Genl In Chief 35G85pd
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Halleck, Henry W.
Washington, D.C.
Wheeling, (West) Virginia
Pierpont, Francis H.
